pageContext.claim: “Thanks to our $2 billion investment in new armored vehicle, workers at the legendary tank plant in Lima, Ohio, are now back on the job, churning out M1 Abrams tanks.”
pageContext.analysis: This plant never closed or stopped making M1 Abrams tanks. Because of the investment Trump mentioned, "the factory turns out 11 upgraded Abrams tanks a month now, up from just one per month a year ago," according to the Los Angeles Times.
